name: One Bullet Gun
description:
One Bullet Gun was created 

for the GAMES JOBS LIVE Game Parade 2020

By Mauro Lana

Enjoy :)

This is a FPS puzzle platformer where you can only live as long as the bullet is in your gun or flying. 

To solve puzzles you will need to shoot targets around the levels and try to catch your bullet when it bounces back at you! To do so, just try to stand in your bullet trajectory.

If you fail to catch it, or you miss a shot, you will simply restart the level. Your bullet will change colour as its lifespan depletes, from yellow to red. When the bullet is about to die, a warning sound will notify you.  

There are 4 levels with this first release. Each level contains a secret (extra score points!), so keep an eye out for those.
